long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop on Amazon and support your favorite charities and organizations with just one click. Makemesmile is a Chrome extension that automatically helps ensure that your Amazon purchase can be correctly attributed to Amazon Smile, a charitable program. 

Make your online purchases count with no extra effort on your part by downloading this free extension.

What Is Amazon Smile?
Free 2-day shipping. Streaming services. Music and photos. Amazon seamlessly provides it all. Now, if you’ve been longing to donate more to your charities and causes you care about, you’ll really enjoy how easy Amazon is making it for you to give back. Millions of people shop on this convenient platform each day. With Amazon Smile, you can now donate 0.5% of your purchases to the charitable partner of your choice.

But here’s the thing. In order for your purchase to qualify, it needs to be made through the Amazon Smile domain, smile.amazon.com. Any purchase qualifies so long as it is made through this link and not the normal Amazon.com domain. 

We know you have a lot to keep track of, so we decided to make it easier for you by developing a Chrome extension that automatically redirects you to the Amazon Smile link so a percentage of your Amazon purchase can go toward a supported charity. That’s it. It’s easy, free, automatic. If you have any questions, check out our FAQ section, or click below to download our Google Chrome extension.

1. Install Makemesmile
Chrome extensions make your online experience more convenient and the Makemesmile extension is no different. Just click here to install the browser extension in seconds. No pop-ups or additional sign-ups required.

2. Turn Shopping Into Donations
Once the extension is downloaded, you can then select your charity or organization of choice to turn your shopping into donations. Amazon Smile partners with charitable organizations possessing a 501(c)(3) status that are located in the U.S. and its surrounding territories. 

FAQ
Do you collect any private data?
No. While this is a free tool there is no catch and we don’t collect information on your shopping habits or any other personal data.

Do I need to sign up?
Using coupons is always free, no login required. However, we encourage you to take advantage of some of the features that come along with a user account. You can set up email alerts for your favorite stores, participate in our Pays-2-Share program by entering coupons, and even manage promotional content for your own online business.
Cash Back offers always require an account to redeem offers and monitor payment status. The Scout Chrome Extension does not require an account, except to activate cash back offers.

Do charities get to keep the full .5%?
Yes. Amazon pays all expenses of the AmazonSmile Foundation. No extra fees are deducted from your donation amount generated by purchases on AmazonSmile.

How can I submit a coupon?
Visit our Submit a Coupon page and enter the store's url along with the discount and coupon code. If you're logged in and are enrolled in the Pays-2-Share program, you'll earn money every time someone uses your coupons (from participating stores)
